text:
Create a labeled sketch of the situation using the drawing tile.

( ) Sketch out the situation

  • Use the drawing tools to design sketches. Test out the different options.
  • Upload images from your computer and then annotate them using the drawing tools

tiles.title: Toolbar buttons for the drawing tile

text:
( ) Create chips to label your drawing using the Create Variable button. Video Tutorial

Your variables can include any combination of:

  • Short name (No spaces, case sensitive, should be short but informative)
  • Description (Space to take a few notes to jog your memory. Long ideas should be in the text tile instead)
  • Units (Do you already have an idea of what the units should be?)
  • Value (This is what you are temporarily setting this value to, if you have an idea. Be sure to keep good notes to explain how you chose this number!)

( ) If you have already created variables elsewhere, insert them here using the Insert Variable(s) button to either annotate your existing sketch or to help you decide what else you need to do to improve your sketch of the situation.

( ) Use the Edit Variable button to make any necessary changes to your existing variables.
Here are some images you might want to use. These can be dragged into your workspace on the right. They can be dragged into drawing tiles.

tiles.title: Distribution of Global Population 2021 by continent
Population by age bracket around the world, 2022
